verses.content: “Tûkhawm Kohran hotua ṭhang a nuom chun, sinthaw ṭha a nuom a nih,” ti hi ân dik a nih.
Chuongchun, kohran hotu chu sawisêlbo, nuhmei pakhat nei, insûm thei, lungril indiktak, mi fel, mi lâwm dân thiem, inchûktir dân thiem,
uoin inrui hmang naw, mi vuo hmang naw, mi nunnêmtak ni lem ding, mi kâwmaw ni lo, tangka sum ngaina naw mi,
inzaumtaka mâni nauhai thu- nuna, mâni insûng khawsak rêl fel thiem mi a ni ding a nih;
(miin mâni insûng khawsak hman a rêl fel thiem naw chun, Pathien kohran iengtin am enkawl a ta?)
Ringthar a ni ding a ni nawh a, chuong naw chun, chapoin um a ta, Diebol thiemnaw changna chu chang ve rawi a tih.
Chuong naw khawm chu, puo- tienga mihai inpâkin a um bawk ding a nih; chuong naw chun, hrilsieta umin diebol chângah âwk rawi a tih.
Chuong ang bawkin, kohran rawngbâwltuhai chu mi inzaum an ni ding a nih; bâutam dâm, uoin he dâm, hlêpna inthieng nawa duâm mi an ni ding a ni nawh;
sie le ṭha hrietna inthienga ring- na thurûk chu pawm mi an ni lem ding a nih.
Chun, chuonghai khawm chu infiein um hmasa raw hai se, chu hnunga sawisêlbo an lo ni chun, ko- hran rawngbâwl tieng sin thaw raw hai se.
Chuong ang bawkin nuhmeihai khawm mi inzâum an ni ding a nih; hêktuhai ni loin, insûm thei le iengkima ringum an ni ding a nih.
Kohran rawngbâwltuhai chu an nauhai le anni insûng khawsak rêl felin nuhmei pakhat nei mi ni raw hai se.
Kohran rawngbâwl tieng sin thaw ṭha tahai chun, ngîrna ṭha tak le, Krista Isu ringna kawnga chun huoina nasatak an insiem hlak sih a.
Sâwt nawtê hnunga i kuoma hung beiseiin hieng thu hi i kuomah ka ziek a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, ka la um sâwt tâk duoiin Pathien sûnghai laia mi iengtin am an um ding ti i hriet theina dingin ka ziek a nih; Pathien sûnghai chu Pathien hring kohran, thutak ban le innghatna chu an nih.

Chun, Pathien ngaisakna thu- rûk chu sêl ruol loin a ropui a nih: “Ama, tisaa hung inlang, Thlaraua thiem chang, Vântirkohai ihmu, Hnamhai laia tlânginsampui, Khawvêla mihai iawi, Ropuinaa zuk ṭhuoi ta chu,”
